mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT ( POSTSEQ, CONTENT, COMMENTWRITEID, COMMENTWRITEDT ) VALUES ( #{postSeq}, #{content}, #{commentWriteId}, SYSDATE() )
INSERT INTO COMMENT ( POSTSEQ, CONTENT, COMMENTWRITEID, COMMENTWRITEDT, COMMENTDEPTH, COMMENTGROUP ) VALUES ( #{postSeq}, #{content}, #{commentWriteId}, SYSDATE(), 1, #{commentGroup} )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENT SET REPLYCOUNT = REPLYCOUNT + 1 WHERE COMMENTSEQ = #{commentSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT REPLYCOUNT FROM COMMENT WHERE COMMENTSEQ = #{commentSeq}

SELECT COMMENTSEQ, POSTSEQ, CONTENT, LIKES, COMMENTDEPTH, REPLYCOUNT, COMMENTWRITEID, COMMENTWRITEDT, COMMENTCHGID, COMMENTCHGDT, ISDELETED FROM COMMENT WHERE POSTSEQ = #{postSeq} AND ISDELETED = 0 AND COMMENTDEPTH = 0 ORDER BY COMMENTSEQ

SELECT COMMENTSEQ, POSTSEQ, CONTENT, LIKES, COMMENTDEPTH, COMMENTGROUP, COMMENTWRITEID, COMMENTWRITEDT, COMMENTCHGID, COMMENTCHGDT, ISDELETED FROM COMMENT WHERE COMMENTGROUP = #{commentSeq} AND ISDELETED = 0 ORDER BY COMMENTSEQ
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENT SET CONTENT = #{content}, COMMENTCHGID = #{commentChgId}, COMMENTCHGDT = SYSDATE() WHERE COMMENTSEQ = #{commentSeq}
UPDATE COMMENT SET ISDELETED = 1 WHERE COMMENTSEQ = #{commentSeq}
UPDATE COMMENT SET REPLYCOUNT = REPLYCOUNT -1 WHERE COMMENTSEQ = (SELECT COMMENTGROUP FROM COMMENT WHERE COMMENTSEQ = #{commentSeq})
UPDATE COMMENT SET LIKES = LIKES + 1 WHERE COMMENTSEQ = #{commentSeq}
UPDATE COMMENT SET LIKES = LIKES - 1 WHERE COMMENTSEQ = #{commentSeq}
